title: ⚛️ ReactJS - Quiz ⚛️
description: Teste os seus conhecimentos sobre CSS e vamos ver quantos layouts você vai deixar de quebrar

questions.question: What is the testing library most often associated with React?
What is the name of the tool used to take JSX and turn it into createElement calls?
What can you use to handle code splitting?
Why is it important to avoid copying the values of props into a component's state where possible?
choices: because you want to allow a component to update in response to changes in the props
because getDerivedStateFromProps() is an unsafe method to use
because you want to allow data to flow back up to the parent
because you should never mutate state
questions.answer: because you want to allow a component to update in response to changes in the props

questions.question: Which of these terms commonly describe React applications?
Which attribute do you use to replace innerHTML in the browser DOM?
To create a constant in JavaScript, which keyword do you use?
Why might you use a ref?
choices: to directly access the DOM node
to refer to another JS file
questions.answer: to directly access the DOM node

questions.question: If you want to import just the Component from the React library, what syntax do you use?
What is sent to an Array.map() function?
choices: the number of times you want to call the function
the name of another array to iterate over
a callback function that is called once for each element in the array
a string describing what the function should do
questions.answer: a callback function that is called once for each element in the array
